properties.entry: SELECT P.ORDER_NO ,TOTAL_PRICE ,FINAL_PRICE ,ORDER_DATE ,P.PNO ,ORDER_OPT ,ORDER_COUNT ,SOLDOUT ,TITLE ,S_DATE ,E_DATE FROM "ORDER_P" P JOIN "ORDER" O ON (O.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT ON (PRODUCT.PNO = P.PNO) ORDER BY P.ORDER_COUNT DESC

SELECT ORDER_DATE ,ORDER_COUNT ,P.ORDER_STATUS ,TOTAL_PRICE ,FINAL_PRICE FROM "ORDER_P" P JOIN "ORDER" O ON (O.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT ON (PRODUCT.PNO = P.PNO) WHERE O.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN '?' AND '?' ORDER BY P.ORDER_COUNT DESC
